magic.connectors.metrics.title: Usage information
magic.connectors.metrics.description: The data below displays current usage. The graph shows usage from the hour.
magic.connectors.metrics.error_fetching_: There was an error fetching your data
magic.connectors.metrics.cpuLoadPercenta: The percentage of total Magic WAN Connector CPU time dedicated to running processes. If the CPU load percent is above 100%, there are processes waiting in the queue that cannot be run. A healthy range for CPU load is between 30% - 70%.
The temperature of the Magic WAN Connector CPU in degrees Celsius.
magic.connectors.metrics.diskUsagePercen: The percentage of used space on the Magic WAN Connectoru2019s disk drive.
magic.connectors.metrics.memoryUsagePerc: The percentage of memory currently dedicated to processes on the Magic WAN Connector.
magic.policies.lan.title: LAN policies
magic.policies.lan.description: Define how traffic flows between LANs without leaving your local network.
magic.policies.lan.table.name: Name
magic.policies.lan.table.no_policies_des: There are currently no LAN policies for this site.
magic.policies.form.title: Magic LAN Policy
magic.policies.form.input.name: Policy name
magic.policies.delete.confirm.title: Delete %{name}
magic.policies.delete.confirm.descriptio: Are you sure you would like to delete this policy?
magic.policies.delete.confirm.checkbox: I understand that deleting a policy is permanent.
